moves.1. e4 e6: French defense, the computer had been playing French and Caro-kann.
moves.6. b3: It seemed like a fine move at the time, and looking at the Gameknot DB, it wins 70%, loses 17%, and draws 11%, being played 17 times.
moves.6... cxb3 7. axb3 Nh6: Planning to bring his knight to f5, putting pressure on the d4 pawn.
moves.8. Bd3 Nf5 9. Bg5: Threatening the queen, another option is to simply castle.
moves.12... a5: The centre is closed, so the computer is going to attack from the wing.
moves.13. Qc2 Bd7 14. g4: G4. Was it a mistake, or a good move?
moves.14... Nh4 15. Bxh7+: That's why I thought it was good.
moves.17. Nxh4 Qxh4 18. Bxg6 fxg6 19. Qxg6: Black's king side is destroyed, and soon mine will be too.
moves.19... Qxh3 20. f4: ! Black could play for a draw with Qg3+ continual check.
moves.21. Rf3: !! Wins. Threatening the queen and threatening Rh3#.
moves.21... Qxa1+ 22. Kg2: There's nothing black can do to stop Rh3#
moves.22... Nxd4 23. Rh3#: CHECKMATE! I love sacrificing pieces to win! Please comment and thanks for reading!

gameName: G4! Was It A Good Move?
